reviews.comment: Absolutely authentic and in perfect condition! Hoa was very professional and responsive. Fast transaction and great communication. Highly recommended seller!
Perfect buyer! Payment was quick and pickup was smooth. Very polite and easy to deal with. Would definitely do business again!
Amazing seller! The books are in excellent condition and exactly as described. Mai was very understanding about student budget. Thank you so much!
Good quality gym equipment as described. Delivery was on time and Tuan helped carry everything upstairs. Minor wear on bench but overall satisfied.
Excellent MacBook in perfect condition! Linh was very knowledgeable and professional. All original accessories included. Highly recommend!
Perfect bike for my needs! Duc is very honest about the condition and let me test ride before buying. Great mechanic and seller!
Good tent for the price. Easy setup and waterproof as advertised. Tuan was helpful with delivery. Minor tear in carrying bag but tent itself is perfect.
Amazing LEGO set! Complete with all pieces and manual. Lan took great care of it. Perfect for my collection. Thank you!
Complete manga series in excellent condition! Mai is a wonderful seller, very organized and careful with packaging. Definitely recommend!
Great buyer! Quan was punctual and payment was smooth. Easy communication and very respectful. Would sell to again!
Good communication and honest about bike condition. Didn't buy this time but would consider future purchases from Duc.
Item looks good but seller is a bit slow to respond. Price seems fair though. Still considering the purchase.
